Name: Battle Platform
Description: Characters can mount or dismount this character with their standard move, placing them adjacent when dismounting. Imperials can start the battle mounted on this character. While mounted, place them inside a free space in this character (so it has space for 4 size 1 characters). They share its space, move when it moves, and have cover. Characters hostile to this character must pass a save to mount it. Characters mounting it when it is defeated are placed adjacent and stunned.

Name: Cannon Strike
Description: At the start of each round, may designate a blast 1 area to be hit by off-battlefield artillery. At the end of the round, any characters in the area must save or take 2[D]+[fray], or [fray] damage on a successful save. Any character standing in the center space is also stunned on a failed save.

Name: Deflate
Description: If the War Balloon is prevented from flying, it becomes immobile until it can fly again.

Name: Gunblade
Description: All melee attacks gain On Hit: may deal 2 piercing damage to a foe in range 4 as an effect.

Name: Imperial Automata
Description: This character always attempts to attack and focus on the closest foe at the start of its turn unless it's inside a command aura.

Name: Imperial Command Aura
Description: Aura 3. Allies in the aura gain +1 boon on attacks and can randomly critically hit (+[D]).

Name: Leashed Beast
Description: If not in an imperial command aura, when bloodied considers all characters foes and will focus on the closest character, regardless of allegiance.

Name: Receive Orders
Description: When an imperial starts its turn in range of an imperial command aura, it recharges all its abilities.

Name: Vantage Point
Description: Characters mounted on this character have +1 boon on ranged attacks and increase the range of all their ranged attacks by +4.
